Diskus came crawling back and Stronghold slung him over his shoulder.

"Goo=
dbye Airbomber." Deemos said. Deemos was charred and burnt.

"Let's go back=
, we suffered alot of damage, I think we need more bots for out army." Deem=
os said.

"We are 7 now, should we join Psuedo?" Doom Ice asked.

"Nope, we=
 kill Psuedo." Deemos replied.

"Oh, I'll kiss him goodbye then." Doom Ice =
said. She smiled, that made Deemos smile.

"What about Airbomber?' Artist a=
skes.

"Don't worry, his death may be slow and torturous, but he died for t=
he right cause, my cause, and the universal cause, to protect all bots ever=
ywhere, the Chosen One cause." Deemos said. He invisioned himself standing =
on top of the Earth, poisoning everyone and ruling the universe. He envisio=
ns himself destroying Unicron, and getting possesion of both the Matrix of =
Leadership and Matrix of Conquest. His dreams must come true, with or witho=
ut Inzola. Inzola's absense has boosted his confidence, that little slaggin=
g homewrecker, Stranato did him a favor. The Chosen Ones start back to base=
, the autoguns blasting Rizopas once more in the back before they walk away=
. Rizopas follows, one hand on his back. There were 7 now, but who knows wh=
o could join them next?...
